title: Chia Hsin Cement corrects share repurchase date
content:
4:13am EDT   
Chia Hsin Cement Corp:To repurchase 25,000,000 shares of its common stock (a 3.22 pct stake) during the period from Aug. 29 to Oct. 27.Price range of shares to be repurchased is T$7 per share ~ T$12 per share.Total share repurchase consideration is T$8,077,885,
